Agent Class Reference

The base class for all agents, that can be rioters or police. More...

Detailed Description

The base class for all agents, that can be rioters or police.

Author:
Will Herbert & Emily Holt & Faye Butler
Version:
1.0
Date:
Last revision 10/05/2015 Updated to comply with doxygen and NCCA coding standard

checks if the target is valid, are close enough to the agent, and if they have enough health

Parameters:
[in] _dist input to determin maximum distance to valid target

00201     if(entity->first !=  m_entityMgr->getEntityMap().end()->first)
00202     {
00203       Agent* target = dynamic_cast<Agent*>(m_entityMgr->getEntityFromID(m_targetID));

00205       ngl::Vec3 toEntity = m_pos - target->getPos();

00207       // change target
00208       if(distSqFromEachOther > ((m_boundingRadius * _dist) * (m_boundingRadius * _dist)) || target->getHealth() < _health)
00209       {
00210         findTargetID(_health);
00211       }
00212     }
00213     else
00214     {
00215       findTargetID(_health);
00216     }
00217   }
00218   else
00219   {
00220     // target is not set
00221     findTargetID(_health);
00222   }
